statements: DELETE FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE property_value > 100000 AND last_tax_assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LandParcelOwners WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe' AND parcel_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM OwnershipHistory WHERE parcel_id = 1001 AND start_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PropertyTaxAssessment WHERE assessed_value > 100000 AND assessment_date < '2021-06-01';
DELETE FROM PlanningDecisions WHERE decision_date < '2022-01-01' AND parcel_id IN (SELECT id FROM LandParcel WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM Properties WHERE owner_id = 2002 AND property_value > 500000;
